body_html:
I think this is just a tracking bug.
The issues were known before, so the tests were disabled, but as time goes by we need to resolve all these issues. @meteorcloudy are the failures due to TF code, or certain dependencies we are missing.
Note that we also disable a whole bunch of tests in our cmake build:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_tests.cmake#L189

body:
I think this is just a tracking bug.
The issues were known before, so the tests were disabled, but as time goes by we need to resolve all these issues. @meteorcloudy are the failures due to TF code, or certain dependencies we are missing.
Note that we also disable a whole bunch of tests in our cmake build:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_tests.cmake#L189
